speeches.intro: 1516. Mr W P Doman (DA) to ask the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs:
speeches.text: (1) Whether there were any further investigations into the allegations that approximately R20 million has been misappropriated by the Mkhondo Municipality; if so, when was the investigation conducted; (2) whether any individuals were identified to have been involved; if so, who are the individuals; (3) whether any steps have been taken against them; if not, why not; if so, what steps; (4) (a) what has been the effect of the alleged misappropriation of funds on service delivery in the Mkhondo Municipality and (b) what plans are in place to (i) rectify the current situation and (ii) prevent a similar situation occurring in the future?

title: NW1921E - 09 October 2009
